about_the_game:
A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for...
Before you embark on your journey to Port Royale, don't forget to load the latest glorious soundtrack onto your vessel! 34 tracks composed and perfomed by Dag Winderlich are waiting to be shipped.

Before you embark on your journey to Port Royale, don't forget to load the latest glorious soundtrack onto your vessel! 34 tracks composed and perfomed by Dag Winderlich are waiting to be shipped.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage: 105 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 758 MB available space
